body.name: Evenflo Maestro Sport Harness Booster Car Seat, Crestone Peaks
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 12 hrs 19 mins
features: 2-in-1 Booster - Forward-facing harness (22-50poundss) converts to belt-positioning booster (40-110 pounds)
Dual Cup Holders: Two built-in cup holders keep drinks and snacks within reach - allows the driver to stay focused on the road
Upfront Harness Adjust: Central, front access to the harness adjuster provides an easy way to adjust child's harness for an accurate, snug fit
Shoulder Belt Guide: Automatically positions the vehicle belt in the proper position for your child
Easy to Clean - Wipeable and machine-washable car seat pad removes for easy cleaning
body.description: The Evenﬂo Maestro offers two modes of forward-facing use. Accommodating children 22-110 lbs, stage one has a 5-point harness for children at least 2 years old, and stage two allows you to use the vehicle belt as a high back booster for children at least 4 years old. The up-front harness adjustment is centralized, making it easy to properly tighten the harness. As they grow, the shoulder belt guide assists in positioning the vehicle's belt across your child's shoulder to provide optimal safety. Children appreciate the dual integrated cup holders to keep their snacks and drinks secure. The removable, machine-washable seat pad allows for easy cleanup of any messes. The Maestro is designed, engineered, tested and assembled in the United States. Evenﬂo car seats have been tested above and beyond industry standards and undergo our rigorous side impact and dynamic rollover tests. Additionally, all car seats include live video installation support, giving you the tools and conﬁdence to securely and correctly install your car seat. Note - Snap each cup holder onto the seat.Turn the seat over and make sure the locking tabs on each cup holder are securely locked in place. Harnessed booster height is 28 to 50 inch and seat belt booster height is 44 to 57 inch. Fit tip is top of child ears are at or below the top of the child restraint headrest. Note-snap each cup holder onto the seat until you hear it snap into place. Turn the seat over and make sure the locking tabs on each cup holder is securely locked in place. Note-the child back and bottom should be flat against the restraint. If there is a gap, the child will not be comfortableCleaning InstructionsDO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permittedPlastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents.Take care not to damage any labels.The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry.Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.Periodically inspect and clean the restraint's crotch buckle of food, liquids, and other debris to ensure proper latching. Place the buckle in a cup of warm water and gently agitate the buckle back and forth. Press the red button several times while the buckle is in the water. Do not submerge the harness strap. To avoid damage to the buckle, do not clean the buckle with soap or detergents and do not use a lubricant.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great seat for our Granddaughter. Fits her perfectly and she loves the cup holders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install comfortable for the child to sit
reviews.reviewText: Product seem to be made of high-quality materials, was easy to install, and seemed sturdy. It’s easy to clean and comfortable for her to sit in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Install and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: We only use this seat sometimes in our spare car, but it seems to work great. It is very easy to install and move because it is so light weight. Having to adjust the harness height manually is a bit of a pain because you have to uninstall the seat to adjust the harness, but if you are only using it for one child it isn't a big deal. We are using it in a spare car for two different children so I have to adjust the height of the harness almost every time I use the seat, but the installation of is so easy that I don't mind doing it. Both kids are very comfortable in the seat and have fallen asleep/stayed asleep with no problems during car rides. The cup holders are deep and spacious and their cups stay in without falling out during the drive. Great seat for the budget conscious or if you just need a spare seat like we did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Grandmas car
reviews.reviewText: We bought this seat as an extra for my mother in laws car. It’s great for trips around town. Probably not the most comfortable seat for long trips (that’s why I only gave 4 stars)It’s just what we needed in a spare.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 3 years old love the carseat
reviews.reviewText: The carseat build well. Does not take too much space, Lightweight and I also the the two cup holders on each side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect car seat
reviews.reviewText: This is a great value for your money. Easy to install, our child seems to be comfortable and it has extra storage. I would buy it again, no questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for travel
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for my 2.5 when we travel on airplanes. We use it on her seat because she will not sit still in just the airline seat. Its very lightweight and easy to transport through the airport. If your child is tall I would definitely recommend getting extra legroom because the way the car seat is positioned their feet are VERY close to the seat in front of her. The cup holders are great, but they seem to pop out easily. The seat itself isn't very padded so she doesn't fall asleep as easily in it as her normal car seat but it serves its purpose for vacations. In my opinion a lot easier that having a finicky toddler on a plane AND renting a car seat at our destination. It had the best ratings for the weight so I went with this one over a few others I had seen on amazon. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars for safety features is because its SO lightweight I'm not really sure how it would hold up in an accident. My current GRACO car seat feels like a tank in comparison to this.

Love love love this. We were having to move the car seat between vehicles. So got this one and it was so easy to just click in. Cup holders are great. I love that it’s a little less bulky but has the 5 point harness until she’s ready for the full seat belt
